    public class AccentuationDefComponent
extends com.alee.laf.panel.WebPanel
    This component is used to create accentuation editing components in class AccentuationPatternDefEditDialog.

      • updateValue

        private void updateValue(int accentuationIndex,
                         double value,
                         java.awt.Component counterpart)
        a helper method for the change listeners of the sliders and spinners that have to update the underlying values as well as their counterparts
        Parameters:
        accentuationIndex - the part of the accentuation that must be updated
        value - the update value
        counterpart - either the slider or the spinner that has to be updated
